about_the_game:
This takes place in a dreamlike and fantastical world, where "A Day in the Life of a Contract Girlfriend: Larell and Lis" embarks on a warm and surprising adventure.

This game is built on classic entertainment gameplay, weaving a touching sweet story!

Welcome to Ansano Haven. Before that, you need to abide by the following rules:

Men and women must sign a contract to be responsible for each other when they cooperate;

Unconditionally believe in, respect, and love the goddess Laleer;

Do not leave the village without a pass;

You can now start a new life in this beautiful village

Game features

Unlock by eliminating: Unlock exquisite illustrations by eliminating three blocks, bringing visual enjoyment.

Rich illustrations: As the plot progresses, the character illustrations change in stages, showing diverse images.

Multiple heroines: Three female characters with different personalities, independent plots and multiple endings.

18 exquisite illustrations: Exquisite illustrations present moving moments.

One-click skip: Quickly advance, skip repeated content, and play easily.

Character Introduction

Name: Larell, Belonging 'Holy' Goddess

Holy goddess, meticulous and perfectionist.

With an unknown dark side, there is a clear contrast.

Name: Sir Laryl is right! ”

Vibrant Sunlight Little Believer, Simple and Brainless

Name: Shirley Feld "Goddess, Times Have Changed"

Righteous and generous female hunter, straightforward and honest miss.

Rebellious towards freedom, refusing responsibility, atheist

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not suitable for all ages: revealing clothing, general adult content
All characters involved in sexual content are 18 years of age or older.

This takes place in a dreamlike and fantastical world, where "A Day in the Life of a Contract Girlfriend: Larell and Lis" embarks on a warm and surprising adventure.

This game is built on classic entertainment gameplay, weaving a touching sweet story!

Welcome to Ansano Haven. Before that, you need to abide by the following rules:

name: Days with girlfriends : Laler&Reese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: This is a classic match-3 game that combines fun, challenge and romance. You need to complete various tasks and challenges by eliminating the same gems! Quickly connect them to eliminate them! Every time you successfully pass a level, you will be rewarded with exquisite and beautiful illustrations.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
